application_credentials.description: Local Photos integration allows you to display photos from your local storage in Home Assistant. Place your photos in the /config/www/photos directory, with each album in its own subdirectory.

abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.

reauth_confirm.description: The Local Photos integration needs to be reconfigured
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Integration

albumselect.title: Select album to add
albumselect.description: Album will be added as a seperate entity after a short period of time.

integration_deprecation.title: Local Photos integration information
integration_deprecation.description: This integration displays photos from your local storage. Place your photos in the /config/www/photos directory, with each album in its own subdirectory.
